Reviews.Content: spent night june 2010 flight lax nice staff helpful beds comfortable shuttle service lax excellent plan stay august am la

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, close to LAX, very friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: bcfeyetr
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights past check housekeeping cleaning apologizing times quickly set nice clean quiet facing street issues noisebut day found fee parking effect oh wass hundreds looked tripadvisor free parking maam comp parking youre staff minor complaints im pretty 3 elevators time slow fast food rest walking distance pizza bell didnt feel safe vibe dark im city 700000 canada opinion hot breakfast lot variety filled regularly tasted goodthere meat sausages bacon protein option

Reviews.Title: “still great!”
Reviews.Author: daniel_m84
Reviews.Content: time stayed 6 months hasnt changed awesome value money excellent proximity lax airport 1 night stay la flew day la quinta extremely clean comfortable gas station 2 doors mcdonalds door quick meal breakfast serve incredible cereals fruit hot food bagels etc etc gym inside adequate quick burn calories highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Great for a pre/after flight stopover”
Reviews.Author: SurferDave08
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel couple times la quinta thoroughly recommend pre flight stopover it’s easy convenient location car rental access freeways modern flat screens clean comfortable quiet particularly century blvd prices reasonable include standard buffet style breakfast restaurant didn’t try warned hotel popular tour parties prepared bit battle breakfast free shuttle tofrom airport 15 minutes 24hrs day calls hotels definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay for a few nights if you need to be close to LAX airport”
Reviews.Author: destinymayhem
Reviews.Content: partner caught free shuttle la quinta checked pretty quickly spacious clean wasnt looking main road noise night trying sleep faced holiday inn looking window planes flying lax airport stayed 2 days3 nights till flew york day taxi santa monica 40 little bit day trip day manhattan beach catching trolley goes font hotel purchased tickets hotel lobby 10 2 hotel 5 minutes walking distance mcdonals subway taco bell pizza hut corner internet cafe road theres little shop hotel sadly discovered day saved trips pool gym free breakfast morning issue hotel elevators slow maybe standing 5 minutes waiting updown levels otherwise stay

Reviews.Title: “Beware the Airport Shuttle time schedule”
Reviews.Author: PARebob
Reviews.Content: despite cosmetic upgrades hotel 60s era dinosaur albeit lipstick price stay flight lax dont rely 15 minutes 247 line bull tell front desk plan taking shuttle scheduled hour arrive airport shuttle serves hotels westin holiday inn la quinta lq line able round trip 15 minutes didnt actually stop pick drop passengers cant shuttle happens lq youll sol

Reviews.Title: “Good Value, but get a room away from the road”
Reviews.Author: jsnisu
Reviews.Content: booked 2 2 nights arrived left traveling wife sister dad night wife facing road sister dad facing road checked time dad road noisy 3rd floor wife heard planes expected 1 bed road stayed nights facing road top floor 10th 6th 10th floor truly noisy expected little airplane traffic didnt expect hear hoopla streets nights didnt 100 am time loud parking 12 little paid 42 san francisco staff nice breakfast dull hampton inns selection 1000 times coffee mcdonalds 150 feet gas station access couple restaurants street didnt check comes value paid 70 night price location id stay probably days fly inout

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely exceeded expectations”
Reviews.Author: JonnoCity
Reviews.Content: 70 expecting pretty dingy wrong pleasant surprise clean airy king bed bathroom excellent getting hotel lax easy shuttle bus comes 15 mins drops passengers door check quick available official check time breakfast included pancakes scrambled eggs bagels cereals milk yogurt coffee etc adequate overall real bargain memorable stay

Reviews.Title: “Terrible customer service for a nice property”
Reviews.Author: ShyamSS
Reviews.Content: dont people expect customer service phone bothered pick phone time previous day tried dozen times change reception check stuff pathetic promptly apologized mistakes happen sadly called stuff evening issue cares damn pick phone front office disconnect paying rental property hilarious isnt hotel nice close airport breakfast ok issue people approach issues concerns

Reviews.Title: “Not bad for price, but OK with some annoyances”
Reviews.Author: solaris_pete
Reviews.Content: price location selling hotel annoyances slow lobby elevator slow tiny parking lot elevator stairs option tiniest elevators seen luggage drop front entrance parking lot tight spots luckily rental car people trucks trouble navigating inout parking lot requires validate ticket parking fee included loud ac road noise century blvd boring breakfast local phone call charge outdoor pool water cold short hours pool fitness centre laundry location close ap car rental returns restaurants fastfood gas station convenience stores malls etc staff accomodating friendly stay mainly price location free wifi bonus

Reviews.Title: “LOVED the hotel and Staff- Highly Recommend”
Reviews.Author: summer135
Reviews.Content: hotel nice clean spacious hotel staff amazing friendly willing help continental breakfast fantastic impressed hotel highly recommend recommend car rental outside hotel global car rental friendly tried rip adding hidden fees trying charge extra day cars dirty safe drive wheel sturdy cheap rent

Reviews.Title: “Extremely impressed with La Quinta LAX!”
Reviews.Author: Foxpup82
Reviews.Content: im giving top marks hotel travel lax australia usually stay super 8 lax excellent value change pace 10 id try la quinta checkin quick arrived little checkin time understanding overseas flight meant lot dead feet absolutely spotless former housekeeper am harsh judge passed flying colours decor modern appealing sheets bed crisp 100 cotton bed comfortable heater easy figure toasty time bathroom totally modern super clean nice fluffy towels hair dryer etc hot water water pressure shower spacious view average huge factor quiet nice quiet day night pretty average talking lax airport neighborhood lot except hotels gas stations action staff nice professional free breakfast pretty basic fine light appetite juice bagels muffins sort dining nice decor brought laptop wifi service easily hooking internet criticism airport shuttle forewarned unlike super 8 shuttle stops hotels found quick worried miss flight time shuttle airport hadnt expected stops missing flight actually plan ahead earlier shuttle youll deal aware time little hotels ive stayed highly recommend staying trip la

Reviews.Title: “Excellent rooms; service can be improved”
Reviews.Author: Ningu1
Reviews.Content: hotel offer excellent value price appointed free wifi free breakfast sad affair poor selection plastic cutlery disposable plates worth stuck lift resolved 20 minutes apology call check ok nice management recommend hotel based excellent offering overall service improved

Reviews.Title: “Not Up to Expectations”
Reviews.Author: Yukon578
Reviews.Content: hoped location close lax compared accomodations la quinta hotels stayed breakfast below expectations size location hotel checkin process smooth professional unless friend traveling pet andor stay close lax recommend hotel bit pricey accomodations la quinta inns lower price pay parking
